location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the Residency at Bushire, to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: * The letter is unsigned, but is almost certainly from William Bowyear, the East India Company Resident at Bushire.The letter discusses the Khaun's [Karim Khan] anger with the lack of assistance from the Company against Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna]. There is further mention of the effect war in Kirmān province is having on trade. The letter is cut short at the end of the page.
